data.title: Letter for the King
data.meta_description: Find out how to watch Letter for the King. Stream Letter for the King, watch trailers, see the cast, and more at TV Guide
data.text:
2008

1 hr 50 mins

Action & Adventure

NR

Watchlist

A teen (Yannick van de Velde) embarks on a treacherous journey to deliver a letter to the King of Unauwen, in order to fulfill a deathbed request from his father. Directed by Pieter Verhoeff.
